page.title: 19Stanway Cricket Club
page.content: {Stanway Cricket Club}is known to have one of the prettiest settings in the county. It is famous for its thatched pavilion. At the moment funds are being raised to re-thatch the roof. The club plays matches on Saturdays and Sundays. Here are some of their results this season: Sat.11th.May: Swindon Nalgo 153 for 4 Stanway 129 for 7. Sun.12th.May: Stanway 167 for 7 North Cerney 37 all out. Sat.1st.June: Stanway 163 for 3 Marle Hill 130 for 3. Sun.2nd.June: Pebble Mill 157 for 7 Stanway 111 for 9. Sat.29th.June: Stanway 99 all out Stratford Bards 45 all out. Sun.30th.June: Stanway 170 for 6 Exhall and Wixford 111 for 7.
